name: [GD] User Altered the Windows System Clock
description: The windows system clock has been altered by a user.
query: winlog.channel: "Security" AND event.code:4616 AND (NOT winlog.event_data.ProcessName: "C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe") and (NOT winlog.event_data.ProcessName: "C:\\Program Files\\VMware\\VMware Tools\\vmtoolsd.exe")

params.body:
{
  "short_description": "Elastic Test - Windows System Time Altered by a User",
  "assignment_group": "infosec_response",
  "category": "Unauthorized access",
  "contact_type": "siem",
  "description": "A Windows system had its time changed by a user.\n  \n{{#context.alerts}}\n@timestamp: {{signal.original_time}}\nEventCode: {{event.code}}\nSubjectUserName: {{winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName}}\nHostname: {{host.hostname}}\n{{/context.alerts}}\n  \nLink to results: {{context.results_link}}",
  "priority": "4",
  "severity": "4",
  "state": "10"
}

params.subject: Elastic Alert: {{context.rule.name}}
